creator: aabual-haj@etq.com
text:
XWPFDocument.enforceUpdateFields() doesn't update the custom properties in the header/footer of a DOCX file, but it updates the custom properties in the docx file body.

A user has to open the DOCX and update the header custom properties manually.

The issue can be reproduced using 3.10 and 3.11 beta2.

Thanks
